roleset.name: hold a second job
roleset.note: MOONLIGHT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'moonlight' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from moonlight.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: Private security guards and moonlighting police can invoke the law of trespass to regulate access to these quasi-public places.

example.name: verbal
example.text: John moonlights as an exotic dancer.
